languages.text: "Да, Кляйн, тебе не помешает перерыв. Может, стоит задуматься о более спокойной службе? Ты уже не молод, пора и новому поколению дорогу дать".

"Indeed. Klein, why don't you go take a break? Maybe it's time you considered asking for a transfer to a less demanding post? Your best years are behind you. You should make way for the younger generation."
languages.original_text: "Да, Кляйн, тебе не помешает перерыв. Может, стоит задуматься о более спокойной службе? Ты уже не молод, пора и новому поколению дорогу дать".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, Klein, why don't you go take a break? Maybe it's about time you considered retiring? Your best years are behind you. You should make way for the younger generation."
"Indeed, Klein, why don't you go take a break? Maybe it's about time you considered retiring? Your best years are behind you. You should make way for the younger generation."
"Indeed. Klein, why don't you go take a break? Maybe it's time you considered retiring? Your best years are behind you. You should make way for the younger generation."
"Indeed. Klein, why don't you go take a break? Maybe it's time you considered retiring? Your best years are behind you. You should make way for the younger generation."

"Indeed. Klein, why don't you go take a break? Maybe it's time you considered asking for a transfer to a less demanding post? Your best years are behind you. You should make way for the younger generation."

"Indeed. Klein, why don't you go take a break? Maybe it's time you considered asking for a transfer to a less demanding post? Your best years are behind you. You should make way for the younger generation."

languages.text: « Bien dit. Et si vous faisiez une petite pause, Klein ? Vous devriez peut-être songer à demander votre mutation à un poste moins exigeant. De toute évidence, vos meilleures années sont derrière vous. Il est temps de céder votre place à la nouvelle génération. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Klein, why don't you go take a break? Maybe it's time you considered asking for a transfer to a less demanding post? Your best years are behind you. You should make way for the younger generation."

traits.locale_text: « Bien dit. Et si vous faisiez une petite pause, Klein ? Vous devriez peut-être songer à demander votre mutation à un poste moins exigeant. De toute évidence, vos meilleures années sont derrière vous. Il est temps de céder votre place à la nouvelle génération. »

languages.text: «Tiene razón. Klein, ¿por qué no se toma un descanso? ¿No es hora de que piense en transferirse a un puesto menos activo? Ya ha pasado su mejor época. Debería abrir paso a las nuevas generaciones».
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Klein, why don't you go take a break? Maybe it's time you considered asking for a transfer to a less demanding post? Your best years are behind you. You should make way for the younger generation."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón. Klein, ¿por qué no se toma un descanso? ¿No es hora de que piense en transferirse a un puesto menos activo? Ya ha pasado su mejor época. Debería abrir paso a las nuevas generaciones».

languages.text: “一点都没错，克莱因，不如你去休息一下吧？或许你可以考虑换个没这么考验人的职位？你的巅峰时代已经结束了，该给年轻人让位了。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Klein, why don't you go take a break? Maybe it's time you considered asking for a transfer to a less demanding post? Your best years are behind you. You should make way for the younger generation."

traits.locale_text: “一点都没错，克莱因，不如你去休息一下吧？或许你可以考虑换个没这么考验人的职位？你的巅峰时代已经结束了，该给年轻人让位了。”

languages.text: 「確かに。クライン、少し休んだらどうだ？そろそろ、もう少しゆるい仕事が出来る場所に移動できるように、申請したらどうだ？お前の最盛期は過ぎている。若い世代に道を譲るべきだ」
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Klein, why don't you go take a break? Maybe it's time you considered asking for a transfer to a less demanding post? Your best years are behind you. You should make way for the younger generation."

traits.locale_text: 「確かに。クライン、少し休んだらどうだ？そろそろ、もう少しゆるい仕事が出来る場所に移動できるように、申請したらどうだ？お前の最盛期は過ぎている。若い世代に道を譲るべきだ」

languages.text: "In der Tat. Klein, warum ruht Ihr Euch nicht ein wenig aus? Vielleicht wird es ja Zeit für eine Versetzung auf einen etwas anspruchsloseren Posten? Eure besten Jahre liegen hinter Euch. Ihr solltet Platz für die jüngere Generation machen."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Klein, why don't you go take a break? Maybe it's time you considered asking for a transfer to a less demanding post? Your best years are behind you. You should make way for the younger generation."

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat. Klein, warum ruht Ihr Euch nicht ein wenig aus? Vielleicht wird es ja Zeit für eine Versetzung auf einen etwas anspruchsloseren Posten? Eure besten Jahre liegen hinter Euch. Ihr solltet Platz für die jüngere Generation machen."

languages.text: "Kesinlikle. Klein, neden ara vermiyorsun? Belki de bu kadar zahmetli olmayan bir görev yerine nakil istemeyi düşünmenin vakti gelmiştir. En iyi yılların geride kaldı. Yeni nesle yol açmalısın."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Klein, why don't you go take a break? Maybe it's time you considered asking for a transfer to a less demanding post? Your best years are behind you. You should make way for the younger generation."
